snippet: Abnormalities were first noticed in Ike Davis's chest X-rays conducted as a part of the team's routine physicals. Specialists in New York made the diagnosis of Valley Fever, a fungal infection of the lungs.
abstract: Abnormalities were first noticed in Ike Davis's chest X-rays conducted as a part of the team's routine physicals. Specialists in New York made the diagnosis of Valley Fever, a fungal infection of the lungs.

headline.main: Mets Say Davis Has Valley Fever
